Name: First Customer
About the game: This game is an FPS game focusing on collecting things. Normal Mode[Use ally] You are an excellent agent of government. Please infiltrate the secret association's home base to collect important documents. Your colleague is an excellent agent Risa. The shield recovers automatically. Physical strength does not recover. There is no health pack in this game. You have to use the bullets and RISA efficiently to get the documents while defeating the enemy. Hard mode[Close combat] There is no RISA in this mode. It will be a tough mission. You have a sword and a shield. You will be able to overcome the situation by the close combat with the enemy. If the player is equipped with a shield, it won't damage as long as the enemy is in front. However, the shield can not prevent enemy bullets. You need to collect all the documents to complete this game. However, to gain 100 achievements, you need to collect all the documents and defeat almost all the enemies. Mission will be even more difficult as there are enemies with guns. I composed all the music. This game is a FPS game. You need a graphics board on your computer to play this game. Select the language on the first menu screen. You can read the contents and the key operation explanation of the mission. When the 'PLUG-IN' button is pressed, the screen becomes full screen and the game starts. The joystick and controller may operate if you set the key assignment by yourself. To bring up the Pause menu, press the ESC key. To skip the cut scene(ending movie of the game),press the space key. Walk: W, A, S, D Run: Shift key Next Weapon: Q, E, Mouse Wheel Targeting: Right Click Reload: R Roll: F Quick grenade: G Toggle help display: H Lean: Z, X Crouch: C Jump: Space Key Turn off the mouse cursor: Right Click [update] I set up the Xbox controller and did a test play. Character movement: Left stick Camera movement: Right stick Open the door(Extra) : B Jump: A Change weapons: Y Reload: X Dash: LS click , B Squatting on the fly: RS click Aim target: LT Shoot Weapons: RT Secondary grenade: Right bumper If the object is not displayed Press the ESC key. Open graphic settings. Set the preset to SIMPLE or higher. Adjust “Model quality”.
